id.napta_id.description: Napta identifier of the Assignment. Either `id.napta_id` or `id.external_id` must be provided (but not both).
id.napta_id.title: Id.Napta Id

id.external_id.description:
Unique reference of the Assignment (see [External Ids](#tag/External-Ids)).
Either `id.napta_id` or `id.external_id` must be provided (but not both).
id.external_id.title: Id.External Id
